text: Caledonia is a town in Livingston County, New York, United States. The population was 4,154 at the 2020 census. The Town of Caledonia has the village of Caledonia. The town is in the northwest part of the county and is southwest of Rochester, New York. ==Other websites== * Town of Caledonia, official website Category:Towns in New York (state)
title: Caledonia, New York
